code: import{toast}from"react-toastify";import WrongAnswerReasons from"../../util/wrongAnswerReasons";export function toastNotifyCorrectness(isCorrect,reason){if(isCorrect){toast.success("Correct Answer!",{autoClose:3000});}else{if(reason===WrongAnswerReasons.wrong){toast.error("Incorrect Answer!",{autoClose:3000});}else if(reason===WrongAnswerReasons.sameAsProblem){toast.error("Please simplify!",{autoClose:3000});}else if(reason===WrongAnswerReasons.errored){toast.error("Our system could not process that answer",{autoClose:3000});}}}export function toastNotifyCompletion(){toast.info("Step Completed!",{autoClose:3000});}export function toastNotifyEmpty(){toast.info("Please input an answer.",{autoClose:3000});}
